item.title: Trees
item.description: I’m frequently picking pieces of paper up off the floor – bits of the kids' artwork. Today I found one with this: That’s actually mine, so I thought I’d share it. Here’s a link to the full page. These scratchings are related to a bit of theory I’ve been working on (with considerable help), regarding phylogenetic trees. It’s part of this paper, which I’m getting ready to re-submit.
